summary.span: 表示配置文件中的 元素。

This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 获取或设置为此标识配置元素配置的最大时钟偏差。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum clock skew that is configured for this identity configuration element.
The maximum clock skew.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 `` 元素的 `maximumClockSkew` 属性相对应。Corresponds to the `maximumClockSkew` attribute of the `` element. 执行时间敏感操作，如验证登录会话的过期时间时，控制最大允许的时钟偏差。Controls the maximum allowed clock skew when performing time-sensitive operations, such as validating the expiration time of a sign-in session.

span.span: <identityConfiguration>
